## Exercise 1

Try simulating a sequence of 100 Bernoulli trials with a success probability of 0.3.

```{webr}
#| exercise: ex_1
______(______)
```


::: {.solution exercise="ex_1"}

#### Solution


```{webr}
#| exercise: ex_1
#| solution: true
rbinom(100, 1, 0.3)
```

:::
